channel.title: UK Science GCSE courswork
channel.description:
Well its coming up to GCSE science first coursework time again and i am offering to do it for you for a modest fee. Biology/Chemistry/Physics coursworks to any standard you wish (obviously dont ask me to do a full marks coursework for you if your a D grade student).
My Credentials I took GCSE Triple Science and got A* in Biology, Chemistry and Physics. A level Chemistry B A level Biology A I am currently studying Biochemsitry at university in my second year (currently achieveing a 1st)
All you need to provide me with is the results of your experiment and i will do the rest of the write up.
I am very familiar with all three subjecs curriculems, and have copies of all the mark schemes that will i will be creating you courseworks to.
Add me to msn: faith_321@hotmail.com
Price is negotiable i take paypal/RS2 gp
I have attached a sample biology coursework on the subject of Anaerobic respiration in yeast using different substrates (Graded at A*)
*DISCLAIMER: THESE COURSWORKS ARE MEANT AS PERSONALLY TAILORED GUIDES FOR YOU, COPYING IS CHEATING* ;)
